Uses of Interface
dataset.Instance

Packages that use Instance 
Package Description
classifier
Contains classes and interfaces necessary to build classifiers and evaluate their performance.
dataset
Contains the necessary classes and interface to create a dataset, consisting of attributes and classes represented by integers and also to load them from a file.

  • Uses of Instance in classifier

    Classify an instance with the classifier

    Classify an instance with the classifier
    protected double AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier.computeJointProbabilityD​(Instance i, int c)
    Computes the joint probability distribution of a given instance i, for a class value of c
